text: Sweet Shadows is the debut album by the American trip hop group Daughter Darling, released in 2002. The album was nominated for Best CD of 2003 at the Philly Music Awards. ==Track listing== # Broken Bridge (Fogelman/Kinder/Walker) – 5:13 # Shattered (Fogelman/Fogelman/Walker) – 3:28 # Let Me Speak (Fogelman/Walker) – 3:09 # Absconding (Kinder/Walker) – 2:46 # Mermaid (Fogelman/Fogelman/Walker) – 5:35 # Sad and Lonely (Fogelman/Fogelman/Walker) – 3:48 # Things Untold (Fogelman/Fogelman/Walker) – 3:26 # Voodoo Games (Fogelman/Fogelman/Walker) – 3:35 # You Won't See Me (DeJesus/Walker) – 3:06 # Sweet Shadows (Fogelman/Fogelman/Walker) – 4:16 # Dust in the Wind (Kerry Livgren) – 3:29 Category:2002 debut albums Category:Daughter Darling albums
title: Sweet Shadows
